column4: your friend is aware of some of the issues with 64 right now?
Well, yeah he's aware, and I am not going anywhere, so will be around to help in future.
I must admit that I have been tempted several times since last night to just format and put i386 on here.
But it's running really well now, and I have only to get flash and previews for wmv9 files to work and it's perfect.
